item.title: 3.8 magnitude earthquake strikes off coast of New England
item.description: A 3.9 magnitude earthquake struck off the coast of New England Monday morning.

item.title: Nvidia, Microsoft shares tumble amid rise of China-based AI DeepSeek
item.description: DeepSeek chatbot tops Apple's app-store charts.

item.title: WATCH: Heart-pounding rescue of 3 skiers caught on camera
item.description: Authorities rescued three backcountry skiers, including one who fell about 500 feet, after they received an SOS alert from an Apple Watch.

item.title: Car plows into Eagles fans in Philadelphia after NFC championship game
item.description: Three people were injured after a car crashed into a crowd of celebrating fans in Center City, Philadelphia, on Sunday after the Eagle won the NFC cha...
